com.google.android.apps.muzei.api
Class MuzeiContract

java.lang.Object
  com.google.android.apps.muzei.api.MuzeiContract
public class MuzeiContract
extends Object

Contract for Muzei's ContentProvider, allowing other apps to read Muzei's current artwork data. This class contains the definitions for all supported URIs and columns as well as helper methods to make it easier to work with the provided data.

Note that this is available for Android phones and tablets, as well as on Android Wear.

          Constants and helper methods for the Artwork table, providing access to the current artwork.
